AUTHOR: Skewer
DESCRIPTION: Sending translated tweets of a user via webhook.
SHORT: Sending translated tweets of a user via webhook.
NAME: Tweet Repost
INSTALL_MSG:
Installed! Configure the cog for your server using the following command.
```[p]set api TweetRepost tweet_user,XXXXX webhook_url,XXXXX consumer_key,XXXXX consumer_secret,XXXXX access_token,XXXXX access_token_secret,XXXXX```.
